noncommunicating adjective
(NOT CONNECTED)
Noncommunicating things or parts of things have no connection that allows you to go directly from one into the other: They can break the reservoirs of oil into noncommunicating sections. The reaction occurs in two non-communicating areas of the cell.
More examplesFewer examplesScientists have studied the brain as if it were composed of separate and noncommunicating compartments.The reservoir is like a cake composed of separate, noncommunicating layers.There may be an infinite number of non-communicating parallel universes.
